definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: heap up (NH id.; Aram. [[חְבַר]] Syr. s.bar is prate, chatter, rave; Ar s.abara is collect, bind together; cf. further Dozy);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחְבּׂר]] Ge 41:35, Ps 39:7; 3 fs. [[וַתִּחְבָּר־]] Zec 9:3, etc.;—heap up, in great quantity: c. acc. corn Ge 41:35, Ge 41:49 (E), dead frogs Ex 8:10 (J), dust Hb Hab 1:10, silver like dust Zec 9:3, Job 27:16, cf. (obj. om.) Ps 39:7.
